benchmark_details.name: Natural World Tasks (NeWT)
benchmark_details.overview: NeWT is specifically designed for challenging fine-grained ecological classification tasks requiring expert annotation, offering a comprehensive evaluation of AI models in small-data contexts.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To emphasize the critical-but-neglected small-data regime and advocate for its inclusion in AI research benchmarks.

data.source: Manually curated ecological datasets for classification tasks.
data.size: 164 tasks with 200 to 400 training samples each

methodology.calculation: Mean accuracy computed with bootstrapped confidence intervals.
methodology.interpretation: A higher mean accuracy indicates better model performance in ecological classification tasks.
methodology.validation: Confidence intervals computed by resampling test sets 1,000 times with replacement.
